guidance.title: [Default value]
guidance.details: Expression for default value: ST-31350A > 4075 Hz

guidance.title: [Operator Action]
guidance.details: Operator action: turbines general fault : DEFTURB

guidance.title: [Possible Causes]
guidance.details: Possible causes: - Speed regulating valve CV31450 set improperly or blocked open in manual mode- Low pressure in the turbine brake (Failure No 5)

guidance.title: [Operator verification & action]
guidance.details: Operator verification & corrective action: - Check the sensor - Check CV-31450 is not blocked in manual mode- Check set point and trends- Check the brake pressure

guidance.title: [Comments for operators]
guidance.details: Comments for operators: Check the sensor : optic fibber in front of neon, 50 or 100 hz on the converter.If not restart of the turbine, check for mechanical failure
